title: Stage Neutralized After Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Dauphiné
content:
Dozens of riders crash on wet roads and officials cancel the stage. Kruijswijk, Van Baarle transported to local hospital.

Read the full article at Stage Neutralized After Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Dauphiné on Velo.
author: ahood
